title: Remove Facebook and Google AdSense Integration
description: Complete removal of Facebook SDK, login integration, social features, and Google AdSense/Analytics from the Farkle Ten codebase. This is part of the modernization effort to simplify the codebase and remove deprecated third-party dependencies.

requirements.detail: All Facebook SDK files removed (PHP and JavaScript)
All Facebook login/authentication code removed from backend
All Facebook login UI removed from frontend templates
All Facebook social features removed (friend invites, score publishing)
All Facebook metadata tags removed from templates
Database schema has no facebookid column
Facebook configuration removed from config files
Codebase verified clean (no Facebook/AdSense references remain)

tasks.description: Delete Facebook SDK files (includes/base_facebook.php, includes/facebook.php, js/facebook.js)
Remove Facebook login code from wwwroot/farkleLogin.php (UserFacebookLogin function, require statements, initialization)
Remove Facebook login handler from wwwroot/farkle_fetch.php (action=fblogin)
Remove Facebook references from wwwroot/farkleGameFuncs.php, farkleFriends.php, farklePageFuncs.php, farkleTournament.php
Remove Facebook login UI from templates/farkle_div_login.tpl (Facebook button, onClick handlers)
Remove Facebook UI elements from templates/farkle_div_lobby.tpl and farkle_div_addfriend.tpl
Remove Facebook functions from js/farkleLogin.js, farklePage.js, farkleGame.js, farkleFriends.js
Remove Facebook Open Graph tags and Google Analytics from templates/header.tpl
Remove facebookid column from docker/init.sql schema
Remove Facebook config from docker/siteconfig.ini (fb_app_id, fb_app_secret)
Fix: Remove remaining Facebook references from templates (farkle.tpl, farkle_div_game.tpl, farkle_app_support.tpl) and clear Smarty cache

issue_details.error_message: Found Facebook references in: farkle.tpl (facebook.js script), farkle_div_game.tpl (facebook_button.png), farkle_app_support.tpl (community page links), vendor autoload (deleted files), compiled templates cache
issue_details.context: Final verification grep found remaining references
